pages.text: Abo trokhy bilʹshe. Ta prochytanyy Quran vid korky do korky
mirkuvannya unochi ye bilʹshe efektyvne, ta bilʹshe spravedlyvyy
Vy mayete duzhe bahato chasu pid chas dnya dlya inshykh materialiv
Vy budete svyatkuvaty nazvu vashoho Lorda, shchob prybuty kolysʹ blyzhchi ta blyzhchyy yomu
Lord skhodu ta zakhodu; nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Vy musyte vybraty Yoho yak vash prybichnyk
Ta zalyshayutʹsya steadfast pered yikhnimy vyslovamy, ta disregard yim u krasyvomu sposobi
Ta dozvolenyy Meni mayutʹ spravu z rejectors, khto velykodushno buv blahoslovlenyy; tilʹky davaty yim nevelykyy chas
My mayemo suvori pokarannya, ta Peklo
Prodovolʹstvo shcho mozhe ledve buty kovtnute, ta bolisnyy retribution
denʹ prybude koly zemlya ta hory budutʹ tremtity, ta hory povernutʹsya u weightless kupa
My poslaly do vas kur'yer, tilʹky tomu shcho my poslaly Pharaoh kur'yer
Pharaoh ne pidkoryalysya kur'yeru ta, otzhe, my pokaraly yoho suvoro
Yakshcho vy disbelieve, yak vy mozhete unyknuty dnya tak strashne shcho tse robytʹ nemovlya sirym-haired
nebesa budutʹ shatter zvidty. Yoho obitsyanka ye virna
Tse ye reminder; whoever wills, dozvolyayutʹ yomu vybyrayutʹ shlyakh do yoho Lorda
